content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision in a legal case regarding the division of assets among two heirs the total value of the assets is 25067000 eur and includes goods funds in a bank account unpaid pension funds and a part of a building the division of the assets is based on the law with each heir originally entitled to half however an agreement was reached to adjust the distribution heir 1 who was the partner of the deceased will receive 555 of the real estate and half of the remaining goods heir 2 who is the daughter of the deceased will receive 445 of the real estate and half of the remaining goods the court considered the principles of the inheritance act and the agreement between the parties the heirs have accepted their respective shares of the inheritance including the bank account pension funds and the real estate property they have agreed to sell the property and share the costs according to their ownership interest the court held a probate hearing and declared the cohabiting partner and the daughter as heirs since there was no will the laws of intestate succession apply the heirs have submitted a joint application to the court and estimated the net value of the estate once the court issues its decision the heirs will arrange for the transfer of assets and withdrawal of funds the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the deadline and requirements for the appeal

metadata.subject_of_succession: funds on bank account, unpaid pension funds, real estate
